com.konakart.actions.gateways

Class GlobalCollectBaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.konakart.actions.BaseAction
        • com.konakart.actions.gateways.BaseGatewayAction
          • com.konakart.actions.gateways.GlobalCollectBaseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalCollectAction, GlobalCollectResponseAction

    public class GlobalCollectBaseAction
extends BaseGatewayAction
    This class is a Base Action class for sending and parsing messages to/from GlobalCollect.
